plots¶

gwasr.asr_plots.plots(ipath, single_folder=False, imfs_to_plot=None, imf_thr=None, omegagram_thr=None, comparison=None, comparison_thr=None)¶

Plot analysis results.

Parameters
ipathstr

path to results folder

single_folderbool

whether or not ipath points to a single folder or a group of folders

imfs_to_plotstr

imfs to plot, can be “all”, “max_corr”, or comma-separated numbers

imf_thrfloat

imfs threshold

omegagram_thrfloat

omegagram threshold

comparisonstr

imfs fo comparison, can be “all”, “max_corr”, or comma-separated numbers

comparison_thrfloat

comparison imfs threshold
